ROOT.ds0: SELECT SIGNAL_NAME AS signal,CASE CUSTOMIZED_GROUP WHEN '0' THEN '事故' WHEN '1' THEN '异常' WHEN '3' THEN '变位' WHEN '4' THEN '告知' ELSE NULL END AS SIGNALTYPE,count(1) AS signalcount,MAX(SIGNAL_TIME) AS signaltime FROM ({{3}})A --JOIN MONITORSIGNAL.DBDEFECT_SIGNAL_TJ B ON B.ID=A.OWNEREVENT AND A.REASON_ID=5 AND ISMANAGE=1 WHERE A.devicename={0} AND SIGNAL_TIME>={{1}} AND SIGNAL_TIME<={{2}} --AND SIGNAL_NAME IS NOT NULL AND DEFECTTYPE=1 GROUP BY SIGNAL_NAME,CUSTOMIZED_GROUP
